Plot: A serial killer pins his crimes on two college students who gave him a ride.
Title: The Hitcher
Writer: Eric Red (screenplay), Jake Wade Wall (screenplay), Eric Bernt (screenplay), Eric Red
Actors: Sean Bean, Sophia Bush, Zachary Knighton, Neal McDonough
tomatoConsensus: Sean Bean tries giving motive and emotion to the hitcher, but director Dave Meyers is more interested in cheap shocks, and gratuitious gore and torture.
